job.name: LcKppi
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} set Name = `basename $PWD` # if ($?NODEBUG) unsetenv NODEBUG setenv NODEBUG yes setenv STARFPE NO # setup 64b # starver TFG20c echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set rung = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set f = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set N = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` # set name = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $4}'` else exit 1; endif set name = "" # foreach name (K_S0 Lambda0Z200cm Lambda0Z200cmFlat Lambda0_bar Lambda0 XiM_bar XiM Omega_bar Omega H3L) foreach name (\ HE3FixedFlat ALPHAFixedFlat \ piPFixedFlat piMFixedFlat \ K_S0FixedFlat Lambda0_barFixedFlat Lambda0FixedFlat XiM_barFixedFlat XiMFixedFlat Omega_barFixedFlat OmegaFixedFlat \ DEUTERON:Lambda0Fixed DEUTERON:Lambda0 \ K_S0Fixed Lambda0_barFixed Lambda0Fixed XiM_barFixed XiMFixed Omega_barFixed OmegaFixed \ K_S0 Lambda0_bar Lambda0 XiM_bar XiM Omega_bar Omega \ LNNFixed LNFixed \ H2LrFixedFlat H2LFixedFlat \ H3LdpFixedFlat H3LFixedFlat H3LrFixedFlat H3RLFixedFlat \ H4LtpFixedFlat H4L2dFixedFlat H4LFixedFlat H5LFixedFlat H6L3FixedFlat H6LFixedFlat \ He4LFixedFlat \ He5L3FixedFlat He5LFixedFlat He5Li5FixedFlat \ He6L3adFixedFlat He6L3FixedFlat He6LFixedFlat \ He7L3FixedFlat He7LFixedFlat \ Li6LFixedFlat \ Li7L3FixedFlat Li7LFixedFlat \ Li8LFixedFlat \ LNNFixed LNFixed \ H2LrFixed H2LFixed \ H3LdpFixed H3LFixed H3LrFixed H3RLFixed \ H4LtpFixed H4L2dFixed H4LFixed H5LFixed H6L3Fixed H6LFixed \ He4LFixed \ He5L3Fixed He5LFixed He5Li5Fixed \ He6L3adFixed He6L3Fixed He6LFixed \ He7L3Fixed He7LFixed \ Li6LFixed \ Li7L3Fixed Li7LFixed \ Li8LFixed \ LNN LN \ H3Ldp H3L H3Lr H3RL \ H2Lr H2L \ H4Ltp H4L2d H4L H5L H6L3 H6L \ He4L \ He5L3 He5L He5Li5 \ He6L3ad He6L3 He6L \ He7L3 He7L \ Li6L \ Li7L3 Li7L \ Li8L ) echo $Name | grep $name if (! $?) break; # if ($name == $Name) break; end echo "name = $name"; if ($name == "") exit 1; set noiTPClu = "" echo $Name | grep 'noiTPClu' if (! $?) set noiTPClu = ",noiTPClu"; # setenv StarEndMakerShell # set chain = "MC.2019a,P2019a,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrY,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,Stx,KFVertex,VFMinuitX,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}; set chain = "MC.2018,vmc,VMCAlignment,UseMCTstart,NoiTPCLu,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,StiKFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}${noiTPClu}; # set chain = "MC.2018,McTpcAna,vmc,VMCAlignment,UseMCTstart,NoiTPCLu,btof,BEmcChkStat,CorrX,OSpaceZ2,OGridLeakFull,-evout,NoHistos,noTags,noRunco,StiCA,StiKFVertex,picoWrite,PicoVtxVpdOrDefault,-geantOut,-evout,-useXgeom,"${name}${noiTPClu}; # set sdt = ",sdt20180426.135000" set sdt = ",sdt20180531.080000" set VFMCE = ",VFMCE"; set Chain = ${chain}${VFMCE}${sdt}",Rung."${rung} set base = ${name}_${rung}_${f}_${N}; # set file = ${base}.event.root set file = ${base}.root set tag = ${base}.tags.root set logFile = ${base}B.log echo "${file}" if (! -r PVxyz.root) then if ( -r ../xyz.root) ln -s ../xyz.root PVxyz.root endif if ( ! -r ${file}) then root.exe -q -b -x 'bfc.C('${f}','${N}',"'${Chain}'",0,"'${file}'","'${tag}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
